work.name: University of Hull

work.name: University of Cambridge
work.summary: Based in the Leverhulme Centre for the Future of Intelligence. Working on using approaches informed by Evolutionary Biology to improve and better understand Aritifical Intelligence.

work.name: University of Cambridge
work.summary: Working in the Department of Zoology with Rufus Johnstone (Cambridge) and Michael Cant (Exeter) on intergroup conflict in banded mongooses. Using a model of evolution for a complex conditional strategy with explicit eco-evolutionary feedbacks.

work.name: University of Oxford
work.summary: Working with Stuart West and Michael Bonsall on eco-evolutionary dynamics in social evolution.

education.area: Computational Methods in Ecology and Evolution
Bachelor of Arts in Biological Sciences
